item.title: Report I-2024050069
item.description:
Report I-2024050069

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-21
  • City: Erlanger
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 05/21/2024 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL CVG hub, 236 Wendell H Ford Blvd Erlanger, KY 41018. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Repeat offender-- This shipper continues to ship dangerous goods without proper preparation in accordance with IATA regulations, despite being rejected on multiple occasions.

item.title: Report E-2024050520
item.description:
Report E-2024050520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-24T15:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-22
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately five (5) gallons of material impacting the trailer floor. The released material released from one (1) 50-gallon metal drum. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the spent material into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
